Text.Page:
Regional predators threaten the trade of eldritch shards and all we've built.

Eliminate {@LinkCreature:34#100#maligos icestalkers}, {@LinkCreature:34#200#caiman slaves}, and {@LinkCreature:34#300#Junaidar thieves}, {@LinkCreature:34#310#bandits}, {@LinkCreature:34#400#scourges}, and {@LinkCreature:34#410#raiders}.

Report to Dena when mission is complete. Take the field!
We appreciate your hard work and sacrifice.
You have your orders, soldier. Carry them out.
